channel.title: Barrows Help! Please Help!

item.title: Barrows Help! Please Help!
item.dc:creator: @Peppers Peppers
item.description:
@Peppers wrote:

My coordinates are correct now but the same thing still happens, when I dig on Ahrims, Karils and Guthans it takes me to a black place on the map but when I dig on the rest it works fine.
Any other suggestions on what could be wrong?

Read full topic

item.title: Barrows Help! Please Help!
item.dc:creator: @runescape_sucks runescape sucks
item.description:
@runescape_sucks wrote:

The coordinates are incorrect, there is no “-1” height in runescape, most dunegons are placed somewhere beyond the wilderness and stuff like that.

And use google, please.

Top of barrows - 3564, 3288

verac- 3578, 9706, 3

dharok- 3556, 9718, 3

guthan- 3534, 9704, 3

karil- 3546, 9684, 3

torag- 3568, 9683,3

ahrim- 3557, 9703, 3

chest- 3551, 9694, 0

Read full topic

item.title: Barrows Help! Please Help!
item.dc:creator: @Peppers Peppers
item.description:
@Peppers wrote:

The barrows mini game on my server does not work correctly if you dig on certain hills it takes you too a black location even though the coordinates are correct, if you dig on dharoks or veracs it works fine but any other hill and it takes you too a black place. Please help.

public void changeLocation() {
switch(c.newLocation) {
case 1:
sendFrame99(2);
movePlayer(3578,9706,3);
break;
case 2:
sendFrame99(2);
movePlayer(3568,9683,3);
break;
case 3:
sendFrame99(2);
movePlayer(3557,9703,3);
break;
case 4:
sendFrame99(2);
movePlayer(3556,9718,-1);
break;
case 5:
sendFrame99(2);
movePlayer(3534,9704,3);
break;
case 6:
sendFrame99(2);
movePlayer(3546,9684,3);
break;
case 7:
sendFrame99(2);
movePlayer(3546,9684,3);
break;
}
c.newLocation = 0;
}

Read full topic
